title: Window Poller Service
description: Background daemon to detect active window/process contexts and feed ContextDisplay component. Part of capability.context_awareness.
acceptance_criteria: Window poller service detects active window on macOS
Service exposes API endpoint /api/context for current context
ContextDisplay component receives real data from backend
Status bar shows active context when available
notes: ContextDisplay component exists at frontend/src/components/context-display.tsx but has no data source. This service will provide the activeWindow and currentActivity props.
